response.overview: Lavender Lounge Studios is pleased to present its latest package of historic gay erotica, "Vintage Bareback: Underground Kink Volume 1". This extremely rare footage of deviant sex acts was lost to an entire generation and only recently unearthed on 8mm film stored in unmarked boxes. Experience kinky gay sex from a period before the phrase "safe, sane and consensual" was coined. Witness experimental S/M and bondage techniques with crude, hand-made sexual devices invented by evil geniuses. Part of a gay XXX film preservation project with hardcore pre-condom loops from the 1970's digitally enhanced and color-corrected.
response.title: Vintage Bareback: Underground Kink
